goal.tools.logging

Class GOALLogRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.LogRecord
      • goal.tools.logging.GOALLogRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebugEvent, GOALBugReport, StringsLogRecord, Warning

    public abstract class GOALLogRecord
extends java.util.logging.LogRecord
    Small wrapper around LogRecord to also store a Throwable cause of the record.
    Known subclasses are Warning and GOALBugReport.
    Author:
    N.Kraayenbrink
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GOALLogRecord

        protected GOALLogRecord(java.util.logging.Level level,
             java.lang.String message,
             java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Creates a new GOALLogRecord.
        Parameters:
        level - The level of the record to be created.
        message - The message in the record to be created.
        cause - The reason why the record is to be created. May be null or a DummyException.

    • Method Detail

      • getCause

        public java.lang.Throwable getCause()
        Returns the cause of the logging record.
        Returns:
        The cause of this record to be created. May be null.

      • getFormatter

        public abstract java.util.logging.Formatter getFormatter()
        Returns:
        A Formatter to properly format this record.
